lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony agreed to a maximum contract extension with the Denver Nuggets, working out a five-year deal worth approximately $80 million. The 21-year-old Anthony, the third pick in the 2002 draft, averaged 26.5 points last season. The extension will kick in for the 2007-8 season and run through 2012.
